title: Computer Center - NSRIT
content: Search for: Computer Center NSRIT > Campus Life > Facilities > Computer Center Computer Center Library Seminar Hall Transport Cafteria & Hostel Sports Recording Studio Talent Incubation Center Design Space Makers Space Other Facilities Computer Center Computing facilities Computer Laboratory consists of 70 Acer Systems. Separate terminal for Each Student. Well Furnished and air-conditioned. English Language Communication skills Laboratory: English Communication Laboratory consists of 65 HCL computers with Head Phones. K-van Solutions software has been installed in all systems. Internet Facility : All Systems in campus are connected through LAN, every system has uninterrupted internet is provided with 50 Mbps speed. Data Technology Lab ×
